system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in. Prerequisite: Ratling

description.value:
Ratling Snipers are some of the best there are, those prominent amongst even these high standards may become nicknamed "Longshooters", hitting shots to nearly a supernatural degree of efficency. Some such Longshooters seek to make their shots as dramatic as possible, swaying battle with a perfectly timed headshot.

Effects: Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Longshooter. Apt: Agility, Ballistic Skill, Fieldcraft, Finesse, Offence, Perception, Willpower Add. Equipment: Good Needle Rifle or Best Long-Las+Telescopic Sight or Best Sniper Rifle+Telescopic Sight, Chameleoline Cloak, Magnoculars. Gain Talents: Leap Up+Meditation or The Bigger They Are. Can Purchase the Basic Orders: Countersnipe and Weak Spot
